title: Site Update Proposal: Change White Font
body:
# Problem:  
There has been mention that the white font against the pink background on some of the parts of the site are hard to read. 

## Example: 
![example](https://i.ibb.co/4FwPN7V/image-2020-12-11-194105.png)

# Proposed Solution:

Change to a readable color

# Choices 
- `YES` - You are in favor of making this change
- `NO` - You are against this change and would like the site to remain the same

# Next Steps: 
If the vote passes with `YES` a proposal for color that it should be changed to will be submitted with choices. 

If the vote passes with `NO` no further action will be taken on this proposal
author: 0x3d2f61ff2F217498c0d236D6246D618CAdE5b5b4
